title.details: Good2Earn is a whole new concept designed by Cardboard Citizens... You have to do good to earn and all of our protocols aim at benefits the real world.

one.title: Provide Accountability
one.details:
• Develop protocols to provide accountability on social actions
  • Our protocols are designed to help profit and non-profit organizations
  • Recycling, reforestation and many more good actions will be supported..
  • Use Solana Blockchain to suit our Customer’s needs
    • Fast Transactions
    • Low Costs
    • Low Carbon Emission

Check our detailed Roadmap !

two.title: Incentives for good actions
two.details:
• Cardboard Citizens NFT holders will be involved in our Web3 protocols
  • Our NFT holders will be responsible of the validation process for providing accountability
  • Vote system will be put in place to interact on key aspects of the project

three.title: The Community though our Protocols
three.details:
• Multiple activities to earn income for the Community
  • Good actions to be rewarded in various forms (NFT, SOL, SPL tokens, coupons..)
  • Soon available in our platform Cz_Breakroom:
    • Twitter/Instagram/Facebook/Tik Tok participation.
    • Discord games and activities.
    • Participating in our free classes and events.

title.details: Good2Earn is a whole new concept designed by Cardboard Citizens... You have to do good to earn and all of our protocols aim at benefits the real world.

one.title: Provide Accountability
one.details:
• Des protocoles ayant pour but de rendre des actions sociales evidentes
  • Nos systemes ont été designé pour venir en aide aux organisations publics privés
  • Le recyclage, la reforestation et bien d’autres actions pris en charge !
  • Solana Blockchain et la meilleure solution car
    • Transactions rapide
    • Prix avantageux
    • Respectueux de l’environnement

Venez voir notre Roadmap !

two.title: Incentives for good actions
two.details:
• Nos holders seront au centre des process de nos protocoles Web3
  • La procédure de validation des protocoles nécessitera la communauté
  • Un système de vote sera mis en place pour inclure les holders dans les choix Good2Earn du projet

More activities TBA soon !

three.title: The Community though our Protocols
three.details:
• Plusieurs Activités disponible pour génerer des revenus pour la communauté
  • Récompense diverses (NFT, SOL, SPL tokens, coupons…)
  • Bientôt disponible sur notre plateforme Cz_Breakroom
    • Participation aux évènements sur nos réseaux
    • Jeux et activités dans notre discord
    • Participation à nos cours gratuit (Crypto, dev, design etc….)

Plus d’activités à venir bientôt !
